memberdef.argsstring: (const char *portName, int camIndex, int maxBuffers, size_t maxMemory, int priority, int stackSize)
memberdef.name: hamamatsu

briefdescription.para: Constructor for hamamatsu; most parameters are simply passed to ADDriver::ADDriver.

detaileddescription.para:
After calling the base class constructor this method creates a thread to compute the simulated detector data, and sets reasonable default values for parameters defined in this class, asynNDArrayDriver and ADDriver.
portName
The name of the asyn port driver to be created.
maxBuffers
The maximum number of NDArray buffers that the NDArrayPool for this driver is allowed to allocate. Set this to -1 to allow an unlimited number of buffers.
maxMemory
The maximum amount of memory that the NDArrayPool for this driver is allowed to allocate. Set this to -1 to allow an unlimited amount of memory.
priority
The thread priority for the asyn port driver thread if ASYN_CANBLOCK is set in asynFlags.
stackSize
The stack size for the asyn port driver thread if ASYN_CANBLOCK is set in asynFlags.

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynInt32->write().

detaileddescription.para:
This function performs actions for some parameters, including ADAcquire, ADColorMode, etc. For all parameters it sets the value in the parameter library and calls any registered callbacks..
pasynUser
pasynUser structure that encodes the reason and address.
value
Value to write.

briefdescription.para: Called when asyn clients call pasynFloat64->write().

detaileddescription.para:
This function performs actions for some parameters, including ADAcquireTime, ADGain, etc. For all parameters it sets the value in the parameter library and calls any registered callbacks..
pasynUser
pasynUser structure that encodes the reason and address.
value
Value to write.

Prints details about the driver if details>0. It then calls the ADDriver::report() method.
fp
File pointed passed by caller where the output is written to.
details
If >0 then driver details are printed.

briefdescription.para: Should be private, but gets called from C, so must be public.

memberdef.argsstring: (HDCAM hdcam, int32 iFrame, void *buf, int32 rowbytes, int32 ox, int32 oy, int32 cx, int32 cy)
memberdef.name: copy_targetarea

briefdescription.para: sample used to process image after capturing.

detaileddescription.para:
This function copies the target area that is 10% of full area on the center.
hdcam
DCAM handle
get_image_information, copy_targetarea
